news.title: Bitcoin Reaches New Monthly High Amid Institutional Interest
news.summary: Bitcoin surged to $42,500 as major institutions continue to show interest in cryptocurrency investments.

news.title: NVIDIA Reports Strong Q4 Earnings, Stock Jumps 5%
news.summary: NVIDIA's AI chip demand continues to drive exceptional growth in the fourth quarter.

news.title: Federal Reserve Hints at Potential Rate Cuts in 2024
news.summary: Fed officials suggest monetary policy may become more accommodative if inflation continues to decline.
